name: Vale-City-Game
description: Vale-City-Game was the first game I worked on with the artist of the same name, Vale-City. In Vale-City-Game you have to win the Vale-City tournament as a newcomer. You only have a month to discover all the secrets about the tournament and the city. Will you be able to knock Charlotte off the throne? Or will you fail miserably and load on the street? It's all up to you!
